Articles.Content:
What if Halley's Comet was butchered and put into KSP badly? (not even icy smh)

Well Wonder no longer!

We have:

Canyons!

Lumpy Terrain!

Terrain Errors!

3/5 of the Gravity of Gilly!

Inaccurate when zoomed out map! (the flats are a lie)

This: https://imgur.com/a/0hOVqrq

And This as an orbit: https://imgur.com/8o1D41A

A complete lack of understanding of Kopernicus Modding! 

This mod is more of a hello to the modding scene, since I want to do more ambitious stuff later. Feedback is wanted (and necessary for this piece of Sh- I mean.. Blip) and tell me if your computer has gone thermonuclear! (not that I can help in that situation, I just wanna watch instead.)

Things to do:

Visit the Canyons
Visit the Northern Terrain Error (Patenting in progress..)

Actually try and land on this thing! (can't imagine the maneuver nodes) Also, if you actually do (without cheats) I will congratulate you by giving you a virtual..... handshake.

Installation Instructions: 

Dependencies:

Community Terrain Texture Pack

Module Manager

Kopernicus
Go on this Github and download "Blip.zip"
https://github.com/Grubbymp4/Blip

Your Kerbal Space Program/Gamedata Folder should look like this:
https://imgur.com/a/2W56ucE

Anyways, have fun trying to land on this thing!

License

Blip is being maintained by a single guy. The mod is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International license.

https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/

Edited March 22, 2022 by Grubby.mp4
I like the cut of it’s jib

Nice 
I'm a fan of those jokes and puns
Ok so I’ve played this mod for around 50 hours so far and I STILL like the cut of its jib. can someone send medical help?
